original_text: They had shields over the front of their bodies, like shields made from iron. Their wings made a very loud noise. The sound was like many horses that are pulling chariots into a battle.
korean_text: 또 철 호심경 같은 호심경이 있고 그 날개들의 소리는 병거와 많은 말들이 전쟁터로 달려 들어가는 소리 같으며

sentences.original_text: They had shields over the front of their bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 몸 앞부분에 방패를 가지고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: Their wings made a very loud noise
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 날개가 매우 큰 소리를 내었고

sentences.original_text: The sound was like many horses
that are pulling chariots into a battle
sentences.korean_translation: 전차를 끌고 전투로 들어가는 말들 같았습니다
